## Notes

### Pairing
Factory reset instructions:
1. Turn on the light for 5 seconds.
2. Toggle the light off and on 6 times, with a 0.5-second interval between each toggle. Leave the light on after the 6th toggle.
3. The bulb will blink twice to confirm the reset.

Factory reset the light bulb ([video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DBc1fIgVXXo)).
<!-- Notes END: Do not edit below this line -->
